info.name: drupal.org unleashed
info.description: sun's view on drupal.org -- Reduced to the max. Key features of this style are - smaller font size; more space for project issue tables, issue filters, etc. - lighter and more reasonable issue status colors. - compact layout for other blocks in content region. Use with Dreditor to complete the experience.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

2014-06-01 Modernized to a clean + minimalistic look.
2014-05-28 Updated for Drupal.org user pictures.
2013-11-10 Updated for Drupal 7 upgrade of Drupal.org.
2011-07-20 Fixed word-wrap for Created column in issue queue views.
2011-07-16 Updated for max-width change on issue titles in queue views.
2011-04-05 Fixed PIFT table row coloring.
2010-10-20 Updated for drupal.org redesign. (second pass, restoring sanity)
2010-10-19 Updated for drupal.org redesign. (first pass)
2010-01-11 Removed dependency on unleashedmind.com.
2009-07-24 Fixed compatibility with http://drupal.org/project/dreditor
2009-05-09 Updated for new blocks on project pages.
2009-05-06 Fixed some links in issue cockpit block not clickable.
2009-05-06 Updated for new blocks and issue links on project pages.
2009-02-20 Updated for drupal.org Drupal 6 upgrade.
2008-12-09 Added lighter colors and changed colors for project issue statuses (thanks yoroy for this idea!).
2008-12-09 Fixed pivot recommendation blocks on project pages.
